summary.span: 命名空间包含一组类型，这些类型在使用 Visual Studio 中的 Office 开发工具创建的项目中扩展和支持 Microsoft Office Excel 对象模型。

span.span: The namespace contains a set of types that extend and support the Microsoft Office Excel object model in projects created by using the Office development tools in Visual Studio.

summary.span: 有关这些项目的详细信息，请参阅 [Office 项目模板概述](/visualstudio/vsto/office-project-templates-overview.md)。

span.span: For more information about these projects, see [Office Project Templates Overview](/visualstudio/vsto/office-project-templates-overview.md).

remarks.format: ## Remarks 命名空间包括以下主要类型：The namespace includes the following main types: - 和类。The and classes. 这些是为基类`ThisWorkbook`和`Sheetn`Excel 的文档级项目中的类。These are the base classes for the `ThisWorkbook` and `Sheetn` classes in document-level projects for Excel. 有关详细信息，请参阅[Programming Document-level Customizations](/visualstudio/vsto/programming-document-level-customizations.md)。For more information, see [Programming Document-Level Customizations](/visualstudio/vsto/programming-document-level-customizations.md). - 和接口。The and interfaces. 这些接口表示扩展的工作簿和可以在 Excel 应用程序级外接程序在运行时创建的工作表。These interfaces represent extended workbooks and worksheets that you can create at run time in application-level add-ins for Excel. 有关更多信息，请参见 [在运行时在 VSTO 外接程序中扩展 Word 文档和 Excel 工作簿](/visualstudio/vsto/extending-word-documents-and-excel-workbooks-in-vsto-add-ins-at-run-time.md)。For more information, see [Extending Word Documents and Excel Workbooks in VSTO Add-ins at Run Time](/visualstudio/vsto/extending-word-documents-and-excel-workbooks-in-vsto-add-ins-at-run-time.md). - 主机控件，包括， ， ，和。Host controls, including , , , and . 有关详细信息，请参阅[主机项和主机控件概述](/visualstudio/vsto/host-items-and-host-controls-overview.md)。For more information, see [Host Items and Host Controls Overview](/visualstudio/vsto/host-items-and-host-controls-overview.md). - 提供 Excel 解决方案，包括中的智能标记功能的类型和。Types that provide smart tag functionality in Excel solutions, including and . - 各种帮助程序类型，如事件自变量和委托。Various helper types, such as event arguments and delegates.
